pageProps.content:
# Szechuan Chicken

~1.5 cups 
serves 2

## Marinade

* vinegar
* soy sauce
* bicarb soda

## Ingredients

* 1/4tsp garlic powder
* 1/2tsp onion powder
* 2tsp cornflour
* 1/4tsp chinese 5 spice
* 1tsp szechuan spice
* 2Tb white vinegar
* 2Tb soy sauce
* 2Tb sweet chilli
* 2Tb tomato sauce
* 1 cup water

## Method


## Notes

good with chicken
